title: sixth_chapter_start
body:
What happened here? I don't know, lets find out
This place is a mess
Watch out!
[[stop]]

title: pikachu_shaped_pencil
body:
Shit man!
It looks as if a war broke here
Look there!
They are fighting undead
We must help them
[[stop]]

title: ron_tm
body:
Why are you here?
We came to discuss matters of war with you
Don't you see I am busy
At war!
My soldiers will show you the way out
[[stop]]

title: conflict
body:
Look, some other breed of undead came through Meviah
We fear they are evolving
Your borders are not my concern
They will come to your border as well
Here we will contain them
Stubborn as you always have!
Continue on this path and you only find yourself in ruin
I do not take orders from you
I'm not saying you follow my orders
Your order is your own
But this region will soon decrease to ashes if we will not cooperate
[[stop]]

title: the_other_cheek
body:
The Mable alliance is no longer!
Its rules outdated
You tried to make me your puppet
And when your plan failed you tried to kill me
I will only cooperate with Mace
You doom us all
No, it is you who doomed us.
[[stop]]
